description: MINEX is an investment project, where we are inviting you to participate. Many owners of mining hardware do not have in-depth understanding of how a particular coin is mined and rent out their storage. Our team is monitoring a wide range of coins, choosing those which are the most profitable for mining. We rent and redirect storage considering all aspects and technical nuances and minimize potential risks, which can arise in the mining. Now we want to increase our working capital by conducting the ICO campaign. Our project priority is to assure profesional work for meeting the interests of our investors.
name: Minex
